entry.title: Thursday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
